recipe.title: Fresh Herb Sauce Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; fresh cilantro leaves ; (20 g)
½ cup ; fresh parsley leaves ; (20 g)

steps.step: Add the cilantro, parsley, garlic, olive oil, lime juice, red pepper flakes, and salt to a mortar and pestle, and crush until a smooth paste forms.
Add to your favorite proteins, vegetables, and more!
